remarks: Restriction of a unique element to a smaller class.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Aug-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 22-Mar-2013.)
statement:
riotass2 $p |- ( ( ( A C_ B /\ A. x e. A ( ph -> ps ) ) /\ ( E. x e. A ph /\ E! x e. B ps ) ) -> ( iota_ x e. A ph ) = ( iota_ x e. B ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
